options.content:
This dashboard shows the details about [Failed Deployment Recovery Time
](https://devlake.apache.org/docs/Metrics/MTTR) in DORA.

targets.rawSql:
--  ***** 2023 report ***** --
--  Metric 4: Failed deployment recovery time
with _deployments as (
  SELECT
    cdc.cicd_deployment_id as deployment_id,
    max(cdc.finished_date) as deployment_finished_date
  FROM
    cicd_deployment_commits cdc
    JOIN project_mapping pm on cdc.cicd_scope_id = pm.row_id
    and pm.`table` = 'cicd_scopes'
  WHERE
    pm.project_name in ($project)
    and cdc.result = 'SUCCESS'
    and cdc.environment = 'PRODUCTION'
  GROUP BY
    1
  HAVING
    $__timeFilter(max(cdc.finished_date))
),
_incidents_for_deployments as (
  SELECT
    i.id as incident_id,
    i.created_date as incident_create_date,
    i.resolution_date as incident_resolution_date,
    fd.deployment_id as caused_by_deployment,
    fd.deployment_finished_date,
    date_format(fd.deployment_finished_date, '%y/%m') as deployment_finished_month
  FROM
    incidents i
    left join project_incident_deployment_relationships pim on i.id = pim.id
    join _deployments fd on pim.deployment_id = fd.deployment_id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
),
_recovery_time_ranks as (
  SELECT
    *,
    percent_rank() over(
      order by
        TIMESTAMPDIFF(
          MINUTE,
          deployment_finished_date,
          incident_resolution_date
        )
    ) as ranks
  FROM
    _incidents_for_deployments
),
_median_recovery_time as (
  SELECT
    max(
      TIMESTAMPDIFF(
        MINUTE,
        deployment_finished_date,
        incident_resolution_date
      )
    ) as median_recovery_time
  FROM
    _recovery_time_ranks
  WHERE
    ranks <= 0.5
),
--  ***** 2021 report ***** --
-- Metric 4: Median time to restore service 
_incidents as (
  -- get the incidents created within the selected time period in the top-right corner
  SELECT
    distinct i.id,
    cast(lead_time_minutes as signed) as lead_time_minutes
  FROM
    incidents i
    join project_mapping pm on i.scope_id = pm.row_id
    and i.`table` = pm.`table`
    and pm.`table` = 'boards'
  WHERE
    pm.project_name in (${project})
    and $__timeFilter(i.created_date)
),
_median_mttr_ranks as(
  SELECT
    *,
    percent_rank() over(
      order by
        lead_time_minutes
    ) as ranks
  FROM
    _incidents
),
_median_mttr as(
  SELECT
    max(lead_time_minutes) as median_time_to_resolve
  FROM
    _median_mttr_ranks
  WHERE
    ranks <= 0.5
)
SELECT
  median_recovery_time / 60 AS median_recovery_time_in_hours
FROM
  _median_recovery_time

--  ***** 2023 report ***** --
--  Metric 4: Failed deployment recovery time
with _deployments as (
  SELECT
    cdc.cicd_deployment_id as deployment_id,
    max(cdc.finished_date) as deployment_finished_date
  FROM
    cicd_deployment_commits cdc
    JOIN project_mapping pm on cdc.cicd_scope_id = pm.row_id
    and pm.`table` = 'cicd_scopes'
  WHERE
    pm.project_name in ($project)
    and cdc.result = 'SUCCESS'
    and cdc.environment = 'PRODUCTION'
  GROUP BY
    1
  HAVING
    $__timeFilter(max(cdc.finished_date))
),
_incidents_for_deployments as (
  SELECT
    fd.deployment_id as "deployment_id",
    fd.deployment_finished_date,
    -- date_format(fd.deployment_finished_date,'%y/%m') as deployment_finished_month,
    i.id as incident_caused_by_deployment,
    i.title as incident_title,
    i.url as incident_url,
    i.url as "metric_hidden",
    -- i.created_date as incident_create_date,
    i.resolution_date as incident_resolution_date,
    TIMESTAMPDIFF(
      HOUR,
      fd.deployment_finished_date,
      i.resolution_date
    ) as "failed_deployment_recovery_time"
  FROM
    incidents i
    left join project_incident_deployment_relationships pim on i.id = pim.id
    join _deployments fd on pim.deployment_id = fd.deployment_id
  WHERE
    $__timeFilter(i.resolution_date)
)
select
  *
FROM
  _incidents_for_deployments
where
  incident_resolution_date IS NOT NULL
